title: Authorised representative duty: provide information and documentation (incl. logs access if under provider control)

legal_consequence.verbatim: [Authorised representative shall] provide a competent authority, upon a reasoned request, with all the information and documentation, including that referred to in point (b) ... necessary to demonstrate the conformity ... including access to the logs, as referred to in Article 12(1), automatically generated by the high-risk AI system, to the extent such logs are under the control of the provider.

items.label: Penalty (Art. 99)
items.text: Obligation/requirement; fines up to EUR 15,000,000 or 3% turnover may apply.
